overview: Created from five years of interviews with 12 young people from across the UK, Our Generation is a captivating portrait of their journey into adulthood.  Often too extraordinary to be fiction, this funny and moving play is for anyone who is – or has ever been – a teenager.  Writer Alecky Blythe (London Road) brings her new verbatim play that tells the stories of a generation. Daniel Evans makes this directorial debut at the National Theatre.  A production from National Theatre and Chichester Festival Theatre.
title: National Theatre Live: Our Generation
